description.value: Your muse is a virtuoso, inspiring you to greater heights. If it's a creature, it might be a performance-loving creature such as a choral angel or lillend azata; if a deity, it might be @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.deities.Shelyn]{Shelyn}. As a bard with a maestro muse, you are an inspiration to your allies and confident of your musical and oratorical abilities. You gain the @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.feats-srd.Lingering Composition]{Lingering Composition} feat and add @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Soothe]{Soothe} to your spell repertoire.
